constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 108 (Tuesday, June 22, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. C. SCOTT FRANKLIN of Florida:
H.R. 4047.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8
=========================== NOTE ===========================
June 22, 2021, on page H3007, towards the bottom of the first
column, the following appeared: By Mr. C. SCOTT FRANKLIN of
Florida: H.R. 404 7 Congress has the power to enact this
legislation pursuant to the following: Article 1, Section 8
The online version has been corrected to read: By Mr. C. SCOTT
FRANKLIN of Florida: H.R. 4047 Congress has the power to enact
this legislation pursuant to the following: Article 1, Section 8
========================= END NOTE =========================
[Page H3007]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

title: Cutting Unnecessary Regulatory Burdens Act
